Welcome to the my homepage! This is the first project of CS5610 Web Development, and also my first website. I am a new programmer who obtained a B.S. degree in Pharmaceutical Science in 2017 and now pursuing a Master's degree in Computer Science at Northeastern University. I am experienced in back-end development, while diving into the front-end world will be my new challenge worth taking.

I am also a big fan of photography. Click on my profile image to take a sightseeing in my portfolio.
